com.blockhaus2000.util

Class Caller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blockhaus2000.util.Caller

  • public class Caller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a caller (for use in the StackUtil). It contains the name of the class that contains the caller method.
    Author:
    Blockhaus2000

      java.lang.String methodName)
        Instances a new Caller.
        Parameters:
        className - The name of the class that contains the caller method name.
        methodName - The name of the method that was the caller.

        public java.lang.String getClassName()
